about.title: The Siwa Palm Story
about.farmLocation: Our farms in Siwa Oasis, Egypt
about.paragraph1: Siwa Palm is a leading agricultural company with decades of experience, specializing in growing Medjool and Siwa dates in Siwa Oasis and the Western Desert.
about.paragraph2: Founded in 2001 as an Egyptian joint-stock company, we take quality as our motto in production and export. We have received numerous awards as the best producer of semi-dry Medjool dates, and we strive for global leadership.

agriculture.title: Agriculture
agriculture.description: Long experience in growing crops, fruits, and vegetables

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Commitment to quality standards in production and export

sustainability.title: Sustainability
sustainability.description: Investment in agriculture to support the economy and achieve sustainable development

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We are here to answer your inquiries and fulfill your orders for our premium products

medjool.name: Medjool Dates
medjool.description: Luxurious dates with a rich taste and creamy texture
medjool.longDescription: Medjool dates are known as the 'king of dates' for their exceptional size, soft texture, and rich caramel-like flavor. Our Medjool dates are carefully harvested and packaged to preserve their natural moisture and sweetness, making them a perfect healthy snack or gourmet ingredient.

siwa.name: Siwa Dates
siwa.description: Golden dates with moderate sweetness and unique flavor
siwa.longDescription: Siwa dates are a traditional Egyptian variety grown in the historic Siwa Oasis. They have a distinctive golden color, moderate sweetness, and a unique flavor profile that reflects the mineral-rich soil of the oasis. These dates are perfect for daily consumption and cooking.

mazaq.name: Mazaq Dates
mazaq.description: Exceptional dates with a distinctive flavor and unforgettable taste
mazaq.longDescription: Mazaq dates are a special variety known for their exceptional taste balance between sweetness and complexity. With a slightly firmer texture than Medjool dates, they offer a unique eating experience and are versatile for both snacking and culinary applications.
